Articles.Content: It likely needs a pretty big overhaul, aside from changed paths, FAR was updated and this changed its aerodynamics model quite a bit.
Nope, just needs a search-replace for the paths. The changes to FAR are in FAR, not in somehow making a 3m^2 wing into a 4m^2 wing.
Any dev version that we can test? I want to use my favorite pack again, and this is it...
Not Necroed? Please Tavarius? We miss you bro...

I turn the empennage tails around/upside down and stick them on the front as really slender nose cones. the only node problems I've found are with the added mk2 parts they seem to have sizing issues and a gap when they are attached.

Anyone Using, or run into problems with this glorious pack?

I know some of the wings don't have collision meshes, but other than that... Everything in it seems to work.

If I wanted this mod, but only the engines and the wings. What would I need to do?

I think I tried it once before but wasn't able to get it to work...

If I wanted this mod, but only the engines and the wings. What would I need to do?

I think I tried it once before but wasn't able to get it to work...

Hi!

That shouldn't be too hard.

1., Install the whole mod.

2., Go to GameData/TVPP/Parts Directory and just delete the parts you don't need.

Fortunately it's quite well organised, so it's not hard.

I also want to point out, that this mod uses KineTechAnimation, ModuleManager and FireSpitter. The one it uses are not up to date, there are more recent versions of them. If you are using B9 mods and already installed it, then you already installed a newer version of KineTEch, FireSpitter and MManager.

In this case you just have to extract the Source Directory into the KSP and the TVPP, then delete the parts you don't need.

Edited February 10, 2015 by GaborT
mistyping

I've run into issues with this mod for 1.02, but it works well up to 0.90B.

The issues is that for some unknown reason the parts accelerate off the plane and the whole plane explodes right on the runway before I activate anything.

I've run into issues with this mod for 1.02, but it works well up to 0.90B.

The issues is that for some unknown reason the parts accelerate off the plane and the whole plane explodes right on the runway before I activate anything.

The wings in this pack haven't been updated for the new aerodynamics, which caused the weird effects you saw.

I don't think Taverius is around anymore. The last post was October 9, 2014.
